headline: Retail crime wave hits CVS, Walmart, Home Depot, luxury stores
summary: While people debate exactly how much crime has been committed against retailers and exactly who's committing it, the numbers remain stark. "Retailers reported an 18% increase in the average number of shoplifting incidents per year in 2024 versus 2023, and threats or acts of violence during ...
